data.title: The AAT(SA) Accounting Qualification
data.body: <p>The AAT(SA) qualification can enable your career in finance and accounting and help you make a truly positive contribution to your business, department or unit.</p><h3>Professional skills to be proud of</h3><p>Our qualification is based on real-world knowledge, supported by in-depth expertise.</p><p>Its value is so widely known that firms like Vodafone, Telkom, and Toyota actively seek AAT qualified staff for their knowledge, skills, diligence and enthusiasm.</p>

SIGNPOST.title: Find out what you'll learn at Level 3 - Certificate: Accounting Technician
Find out what you'll learn at Level 4 - FET Certificate: Accounting Technician
Find out what you'll learn at Level 5 - Certificate: Accounting

data.title: What you'll learn at level 3
data.body: <p>Level 3 - Certificate: Accounting Technician covers a range of basic accounting practices and techniques; from costing and double-entry bookkeeping to computerised accounting. It&#39;s ideal if you&rsquo;re new to working in finance or you&rsquo;re looking to expand and develop your foundation knowledge and skills.</p><h3>Topics covered</h3>
